taskDescription: Camphor, a saturated monoketone from the Asian camphor tree, is used among other things as a moth repellent and as a constituent of embalming fluid. If camphor has M+ = 152.1201 by high-resolution mass spectrometry, what is its molecular formula? How many rings does camphor have?
